actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to reduce temporarily the duty on certain forged ring gear components and certain other parts of crankshafts and connecting rods.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to reduce temporarily the duty on certain forged ring gear components and certain other parts of crankshafts and connecting rods.

titles.title: A bill to reduce temporarily the duty on certain forged ring gear components and certain other parts of crankshafts and connecting rods.
